p: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.
q: Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Movement Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.  When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.
w: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.
e: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.
r: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.

blurd: A Zaunite plague rat by birth, but a connoisseur of filth by passion, Twitch is not afraid to get his paws dirty. Aiming a chem-powered crossbow at the gilded heart of Piltover, he has vowed to show those in the city above just how filthy they really...
name: Twitch
title: the Plague Rat
